name: The European Lotteries
goal: The European Lotteries (EL) is the European umbrella organisation of lotteries operating games of chance for the public benefit. EL has members from 45 European countries including all 28 EU Member States. The associationâ€™s members contribute more than 20 billion EUR p.a. to the state budgets and the funding of sport, culture, social projects, research and other causes of general interest.
interests: Borders and Security, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
Digital Services Act
